sentences.sContent: struggles between the different factions within the party
the leaders of the warring factions

synos.tran: 派别；内讧；小集团；纪实小说

words.tran: 好捣乱的；好搞派系的；源于派别的

trans.tranOther: a small group of people within a larger group, who have different ideas from the other members, and who try to get their own ideas accepted
